name: AGENT NYXIA
description:
In the future humanity colonizes and expands throughout the solar system.  New and malicious secret organizations determined to overthrow the order of planetary governments and sew chaos throughout the system.  The classified government organization known as the SIA has trained numerous agents to defend the Earth and her colonies.  Agent Nyxia has been sent to find hidden agents from the clandestine Dream Scatter group and fight off clone assassins determined to undermine her efforts.

The game uses keyboard arrow keys to move and left control to fire/select.  Shoot clone assassins before they reach you.  Enter buildings to use neuro-interrogation on possible Dream Scatter agents.   During interrogation use arrow keys to select the memory with Dream Scatter content and press control to confirm identity as terrorist agent.

Help Agent Nyxia fight off the Dream Scatter terrorists infiltrating the Mars colony by making a donation to Linear Regression so the sequel will be made.
